name: HSP_ACCT_HX_PHYS
description: This table contains hospital account history and physical data from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the hospital account history and physical related group item.

columns.name: HP_COMPONENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value for the history and physical component (no released categories).

columns.name: PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.
